sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-chart class="chart w-100" :option="option" />
</template>

<script>
import { use } from "echarts/core";
import { CanvasRenderer } from "echarts/renderers";
import { LineChart } from "echarts/charts";
import {
  TitleComponent,
  TooltipComponent,
  LegendComponent
} from "echarts/components";
import VChart, { THEME_KEY } from "vue-echarts";

use([
  CanvasRenderer,
  LineChart,
  TitleComponent,
  TooltipComponent,
  LegendComponent
]);


export default {
  name: "DottedBarGraphic",
  components: {
    VChart
  },
  provide: {
    [THEME_KEY]: "ligth"
  },
  data() {
    return {
      option: {
        title: {
          text: 'Ventas por ',

        },
        tooltip: {
          trigger: 'axis',
          axisPointer: {
            type: 'shadow'
          }
        },
        legend: {
          data: ['line', 'bar'],
          textStyle: {
            color: '#ccc'
          }
        },
        xAxis: {
          data: [300, 280, 250, 260, 270, 300, 550, 500, 400, 390, 380, 390, 400, 500, 600, 750, 800, 700, 600, 400],

          axisLine: {
            lineStyle: {
              color: '#ccc'
            }
          }
        },
        yAxis: {
          splitLine: { show: false },
          axisLine: {
            lineStyle: {
              color: '#ccc'
            }
          }
        },
        series: [
          {
            name: 'line',
            type: 'line',
            smooth: true,
            showAllSymbol: true,
            symbol: 'emptyCircle',
            symbolSize: 15,
            data: [300, 280, 250, 260, 270, 300, 550, 500, 400, 390, 380, 390, 400, 500, 600, 750, 800, 700, 600, 400],


          },
          {
            name: 'bar',
            type: 'bar',
            smooth: true,
            showAllSymbol: true,
            symbol: 'emptyCircle',
            symbolSize: 15,
            backgroundStyle: {
              color: "#000"
            },
            data: [300, 280, 250, 260, 270, 300, 550, 500, 400, 390, 380, 390, 400, 500, 600, 750, 800, 700, 600, 400],
          },



        ]
      }
    };
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.chart {
  height: 400px;
}
</style>
